name: CompSci Uniandes
body:
### Purpose
This repository serves as a collection of the available Computational Science Uniandes courses, data sources and resources.

#### Courses

- [**Computational Methods**](https://github.com/ComputationalScienceUniandes/ComputationalMethods)
- [**Computational Tools**](https://github.com/ComputationalScienceUniandes/HerramientasComputacionales)

#### Data

- [**Computational Tools Data**](https://github.com/ComputationalScienceUniandes/ComputationalToolsData)


### Authors and Contributors

This content was created and maintained by  Jaime Forero-Romero (@forero), Sebastián Pérez Saaibi (@spsaaibi) and Juan Nicolás Garavito (@jngaravitoc)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
